static GdiPattern [] edu.ou.asgbook.datamining.GdiPattern.findTrainingPattern ( LabelResult  cities,
LatLonGrid  population,
LatLonGrid  nightTimeLights,
LatLonGrid  gdiGrid 
) [static] 

00052                                                                                                                                               {
00053         // for each city, compute the other properties
00054         RegionProperty[] pop = RegionProperty.compute(cities, population);
00055         RegionProperty[] lights = RegionProperty.compute(cities, nightTimeLights);
00056         RegionProperty[] gdi = RegionProperty.compute(cities, gdiGrid);
00057         GdiPattern[] patterns = new GdiPattern[pop.length];
00058         for (int i=1; i < patterns.length; ++i){
00059             patterns[i] = new GdiPattern();
00060             patterns[i].data[0] = pop[i].getCval();
00061             patterns[i].data[1] = lights[i].getCval();
00062             patterns[i].data[2] = gdi[i].getCval();
00063         }
00064         return patterns;
00065     }

static void edu.ou.asgbook.datamining.GdiPattern.main ( String[]  args  )  throws Exception [static] 

00082                                                             {
00083         // create output directory
00084         File out = OutputDirectory.getDefault("gdipattern");
00085         final boolean SMALL = true;
00086         
00087         // read input (crop to cover Spain)
00088         LatLonGrid pop    = GlobalPopulation.read(GlobalPopulation.WORLD);
00089         if (SMALL){
00090             pop = pop.crop(980, 4080, 220, 350);
00091         }
00092         KmlWriter.write(pop, out, "pop", PngWriter.createRandomColormap());
00093         
00094         LatLonGrid nightTimeLights = NightimeLights.read(NightimeLights.WORLD).remapTo(pop);
00095         KmlWriter.write(nightTimeLights, out, "nighttimelights", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00096         
00097         LatLonGrid countries = CountryPolygons.readGrid(CountryPolygons.WORLD_GRID).remapTo(pop);
00098         KmlWriter.write(countries, out, "countries", PngWriter.createRandomColormap());
00099         
00100         LabelResult primary = PrimaryCities.findPrimaryCities(pop, countries, out);     
00101         KmlWriter.write(primary.label, out, "primarycities", PngWriter.createRandomColormap());
00102 
00103         LatLonGrid gdiGrid = WorldBankGDI.readGrid(WorldBankGDI.WORLD_GRID).remapTo(pop);
00104         KmlWriter.write(gdiGrid, out, "gdism", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00105         
00106         // obtain pattern
00107         GdiPattern[] patterns = GdiPattern.findTrainingPattern(primary, pop, nightTimeLights, gdiGrid);
00108         System.out.println("Population & Lighting & GDI \\\\");
00109         for (int i=1; i < patterns.length; ++i){
00110             System.out.println(patterns[i]);
00111         }
00112         
00113         if (!SMALL){
00114             write(patterns, out); // for R
00115         }
00116     }

00046             String sep = (i == data.length-1)? linesep : colsep;

00069         try {
00070             String name = outdir.getAbsolutePath() + "/gdipatterns.txt";
00071             writer = new PrintWriter( new FileWriter(name) );
00072             for (int i=1; i < patterns.length; ++i){
